widgets_values:
adjust tile size according to VRAM.

768 works well for 16GB VRAM, 121 frames.
This mask ensures that the audio is not put through the diffusion process.
Disbale LTXVImgToVideoInplace if you want to use text prompt + audio to drive the video generation.

The sad 25 years old  woman with brown eyes and black hair pulled back is singing on a beach. She looks at the camera and at the ground. . In background the ocean.  Static camera.
Natural, realistic human teeth with correct individual tooth separation. Visible teeth anatomy, natural enamel texture, slightly off-white color, realistic alignment. 

Keep the original facial features

Camera zoom
Woman smiling
Hair moving with the wind.
The woman is walking
The woman touches her face with her hand
The woman moves her arms
The woman turns her head

inputs.text: blurry, low quality, still frame, frames, watermark, overlay, titles, has blurbox, has subtitles
